Package jrtr.gldeferredrenderer

An OpenGL renderer with deferred shading implementing the jrtr interfaces.

See: Description

  • Interface Summary 
    Interface Description
    SecondPassDrawer
    An interface for applying a deferred shading pass.
  • Class Summary 
    Class Description
    DefaultSecondPassDrawer
    Sets up a shader and textures for deferred shading.
    DirectionalDiffuseSecondPassDrawer
    Sets up a shader and textures for deferred shading.
    FrameBuffer
    A simple GLBuffer, which contains only one texture.
    GBuffer
    A GLBuffer which contains 5 textures: - positions - normals - colors - texture coordinates - depth
    GLBuffer
    A simple class for creating, reading, and writing to an OpenGL framebuffer object (FBO).
    GLDeferredRenderContext
    An OpenGL rendering context for rendering with deferred shading, followed by optional post-processing.
    GLDeferredRenderPanel  
    GLUtils
    Simple helper class for setting uniform variables in a shader.
    Matrix4fUtils
    Utility class for doing matrix operations to prevent boiler plate code.
    PostProcessor
    An abstraction of a post processor for deferred rendering.
    Quad
    Simple helper class for storing and rendering a quad on the screen.

Package jrtr.gldeferredrenderer Description

An OpenGL renderer with deferred shading implementing the jrtr interfaces.
